column1: Little Goat Diner////The decor lends to an airy and open diner feel
column2: and the servers' costumes are a modern play on diner style too. Starting off
column3: I definitely recommend the Little Goat coffee
column4: which has chai spices and goat's milk cream. I had the Bulls Eye French Toast
column5: which is made with onion brioche
column8: and an over easy egg (which is cleverly hidden inside the toast). I did not think that all the flavors would combine so well
column9: but it is neither overly sweet or savory. I also had a side of the cheesy grits
column10: and they were more cheesy than I expected. Not my thing
column11: but even though I didn't like it
column12: I can't say that it was bad.
